snippet: Donald J. Trump has shuffled his campaign leadership once again, this time appointing the head of the conservative website Breitbart News....
abstract: Profile of Stephen K Bannon, head of Breitbart News, who has been tapped by Donald Trump to helm his presidential campaign.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM
byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer, Jeremy W. Peters and Kitty Bennett contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump has shuffled his campaign leadership once again, this time appointing the head of the conservative website Breitbart News.

headline.main: Stephen Bannon, a Rookie Campaign Chief Who ‘Loves the Fight’
headline.print_headline: Campaign Rookie Steeped in Right-Wing Fury
